code: import"./Formstyle.css";import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Forms=()=>{const[result,setResult]=React.useState("");const sendEmail=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setResult("Sending....");const formData=new FormData(event.target);formData.append("access_key","ce616749-5be8-4e40-a02d-a1c58a3faaea");const response=await fetch("https://api.web3forms.com/submit",{method:"POST",body:formData});const data=await response.json();if(data.success){setResult("Form Submitted Successfully");event.target.reset();}else{console.log("Error",data);setResult(data.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forms",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Your Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"user_email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Subject"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"subject",name:"subject",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{rows:"6",name:"Message",placeholder:"Type your massage here",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:result})]});};export default Forms;
